title: Calories in Pacifico Clara Beer
meta_description: Discover calories in Pacifico Clara beer per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle of Pacifico Clara lager, chilled, no added mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, brand batch, and any additions like lime or salt; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Pacifico Clara beer contains about 135 calories and 10.7 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Pacifico Light per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one Pacifico Clara beer?
What are the carbs in Pacifico Clara beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 10.7 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Does Pacifico Clara have protein or fat?
faqs.a: About 1.1 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Pacifico Clara compare to other beers calorie-wise?
faqs.a: It's mid-range; light beers have ~100 kcal, heavier ones ~150+ kcal per 12 oz.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Pacifico Clara beer?
faqs.a: Low at about 10 mg per 12 oz serving.
